member.name: P:LMDotNet.SolverSettings.verboseOutput
member.summary: true: print status messages to stdout

member.name: P:LMDotNet.SolverSettings.scaleDiagonal
member.summary: If true, the variables will be rescaled internally. Recommended value is 1.

member.name: P:LMDotNet.SolverSettings.patience
member.summary: Used to set the maximum number of function evaluations to patience * (number_of_parameters + 1)

member.name: P:LMDotNet.SolverSettings.initialStepbound
member.summary: Used in determining the initial step bound. This bound is set to the product of stepbound and the Euclidean norm of diag*x if nonzero, or else to stepbound itself. In most cases stepbound should lie in the interval (0.1,100.0). Generally, the value 100.0 is recommended.

member.name: P:LMDotNet.SolverSettings.epsilon
member.summary: Step used to calculate the Jacobian, should be slightly larger than the relative error in the user - supplied functions.

member.name: P:LMDotNet.SolverSettings.gtol
member.summary: Orthogonality desired between fvec and its derivs. Termination occurs when the cosine of the angle between fvec and any column of the Jacobian is at most gtol in absolute value. (measure of degeneracy)

member.name: P:LMDotNet.SolverSettings.xtol
member.summary: Relative error between last two approximations. Termination occurs when the relative error between two consecutive iterates is at most xtol.

member.name: P:LMDotNet.SolverSettings.ftol
member.summary: Relative error desired in the sum of squares. Termination occurs when both the actual and predicted relative reductions in the sum of squares are at most ftol.

member.name: M:LMDotNet.LMA.minimize(LMDotNet.LMSolver,System.Double[],System.Int32,Microsoft.FSharp.Core.FSharpFunc{System.Double[],Microsoft.FSharp.Core.FSharpFunc{System.Double[],Microsoft.FSharp.Core.Unit}})
member.summary: Determines the vector x that minimizes the squared L2-norm of a user-supplied function f, i.e. it determines x_opt = argmin_x ||f(x)||Â²
